name: END_CAP Agent Factory
description: Complete END_CAP Agent Factory integration. Handles OpenAI conversation PRD extraction, GitHub repository creation, Supabase database setup, Google Cloud Run deployment, and Devin AI workflow automation.

secrets.GCP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY: Your Google Cloud service account key
secrets.OPENAI_API_KEY: OpenAI API key for ChatGPT integration
secrets.ENDCAP_API_URL: END_CAP Agent Factory API URL (default: http://localhost:8000)
